attributes.action: Prohibit motorway service stations holding their customers to ransom by overcharging
attributes.additional_details:
Please take urgent action to prohibit motorway  service facilities excessive overcharging on all the things they sell.

The high prices they charge  make many drivers avoid stopping  to have a break.

If they lowered their prices  they  would probably get more customers.

Perhaps you  should enquire whether there is any "price fixing"   between the   competing site operators.
